title: How to Get Piccolo on Super Paper Mario

steps.headline: After chapter 5, go to flopside.
steps.description: Go to Merlee's charm shop. Jump to the back of her counter and talk to her.

steps.headline: She will tell you she is missing her crystal ball, and now has a replacement.
steps.description: She believes Merluvlee has the same crystal ball so you need to talk to her. If you flip to 3d, A guy named Welderberg will make you a pipe there for 300 coins.

steps.headline: Talk to Merluvlee behind the counter in flipside.
steps.description: She needs a training machine from Bestovius.

steps.headline: Use your return pipe and go to chapter 1-1.
Go to Bestovius and talk him.
steps.description: He needs a you-know-what from Old man Watchit. So go to Chapter 1-2.

steps.headline: Old Man Watchit Wants an autograph from Merlumina.
Merlumina will give you the autograph.
steps.description: Go talk to Old man Watchitt,Bestovius,Merluvlee and finally, Merlee.

steps.headline: Merlee will give you a free charm and a house key.
steps.description: The house is by the flopside card shop. Go in, and open the big chest. Piccolo is inside. Congrats!

text: After chapter 5, go to flopside. Go to Merlee's charm shop. Jump to the back of her counter and talk to her. She will tell you she is missing her crystal ball, and now has a replacement. She believes Merluvlee has the same crystal ball so you need to talk to her. If you flip to 3d, A guy named Welderberg will make you a pipe there for 300 coins. Talk to Merluvlee behind the counter in flipside. She needs a training machine from Bestovius. Use your return pipe and go to chapter 1-1.  Go to Bestovius and talk him. He needs a you-know-what from Old man Watchit. So go to Chapter 1-2. Old Man Watchit Wants an autograph from Merlumina. So go to chapter 1-4. Merlumina will give you the autograph. Go talk to Old man Watchitt,Bestovius,Merluvlee and finally, Merlee. Merlee will give you a free charm and a house key. The house is by the flopside card shop. Go in, and open the big chest. Piccolo is inside. Congrats!
